page.title: 02GRINDLEFORD CARNIVAL
page.content:
CAR TREASURE HUNT === ======== ====
This has been a{carnival}event for 8 years.Over a hundred people turned up this year.The{treasure}is:1st prize two bottles of Champagne{,2nd}prize a box of chocolates and the booby prize was a compass. What you have to do to win is:answer all the{clues}on the paper then you follow them.The person with the most{clues}right wins.
MINI ROCK CONCERT ==== ==== ======= The mini rock concert is a{favourite event for the children during the carnival.This is split into{two}age groups.In the younger section{Fame}is the favourite.In the older section {Relax},and whatever is in the charts is the favourite.
